Peps with problems your probably in  the uk using pal not NTSC-U Witch this torrent is (like me) so download popstation 3.71 and then open the "EBOOT.PBP" with popstation Now tick "Recompress EBOOT"  now tick "fix screen height" and click "GO" Trans fer to psp if it doesnt run redo it selecting "fix graphics" as well as "fix screen height"
